column6: THE MAN WHO BOUGHT AMERICA Part 6 The final chapter of the epic "Death of Captain America" saga! New Captain America, the Falcon, the Black Widow, Sharon Carter - all in a final showdown with the Red Skull and his minions for the future of America!
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Frank D'Armata | other:Chris Eliopoulos | other:Steve Epting | inker:Fabio Laguna | inker:Rick Magyar | penciller:Luke Ross
